org.cooperari.core

Enum CWorkspace

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CWorkspace>
      • org.cooperari.core.CWorkspace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<CWorkspace>

    public enum CWorkspace
extends Enum<CWorkspace>
    Keeps a record of the Cooperari workspace directory and global configurations, and provides associated utility methods. Note that only a singleton instance of this type exists (INSTANCE).
    Since:
    0.2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Workspace options.

        public static CWorkspace[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (CWorkspace c : CWorkspace.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        Check if workspace is initialized.
        Returns:
        true if the workspace has been initialized before.
        See Also:
        initialize(File,Option...)

      • initializeIfNecessary

        public void initializeIfNecessary(File root,
                                  CWorkspace.Option... options)
                           throws IOException,
                                  CConfigurationError
        Initialize only if not already initialized. The call is ignored if the workspace has already been initialized.
        Parameters:
        root - Root directory.
        options - Workspace options.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        CConfigurationError - If a configuration error occurs.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(File root,
                       CWorkspace.Option... options)
                throws IOException,
                       CConfigurationError
        Initialize the workspace using supplied directory as root. This method should be called once to initialize the workspace.
        Parameters:
        root - Root directory.
        options - Workspace options.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        CConfigurationError - If the workspace has already been initialized or some other error occurs.

      • getRootDirectory

        public File getRootDirectory()
        Get root directory.
        Returns:
        The root directory of the workspace.
        Throws:
        CConfigurationError - If the workspace has not been initialized.

      • createFile

        public File createFile(String relativePath)
                throws IOException
        Create a file in the workspace directory.

        If the file does not exist already, it is created according to the relative path supplied as argument. All nonexistent parent directories are also created if necessary.

        Parameters:
        relativePath - File object with a relative path set.
        Returns:
        The file object.
        Throws:
        CConfigurationError - If the workspace has not been initialized.
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs creating the file.

      • createLog

        public CLog createLog(String dirName,
                      String logName,
                      CLog.Option... options)
               throws CConfigurationError,
                      IOException
        Create a log.
        Parameters:
        dirName - Name for the sub-directory in the workspace.
        logName - Name for the log.
        options - Log options.
        Returns:
        A CLog instance.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        CConfigurationError - if the workspace is not initialized.

        public CReport createReport(String dirName,
                            String reportName)
                     throws CConfigurationError,
                            IOException
        Create a report.
        Parameters:
        dirName - Name for the sub-directory in the workspace.
        reportName - Name for the report.
        Returns:
        A CReport instance.
        Throws:

        CConfigurationError - if the workspace is not initialized.
